Outside Locations

Silenthollow

Everlight and Silenthollow begin negotiations over the nexus in Year 14.

By year 16, Silenthollow is unsatisfied with their rights to the nexus and try to revolt, however their leadership is quickly quelled and Silenthollow is merged into Everlight without so much as a whisper.

Sanctuary

A hidden mountain dwelling consisting of mostly Primeval Vampires who can shadow walk in and out of the safety of their home.

Haven

A small town in the North East United States that is home to those seeking refuge from the Venatori or their own species. They are typically neutral in all disputes of the supernatural world.
